items.title: VT/STAR Student
description: Joined May 2024
VT/STAR Programme consists of 2 rotations separated by semester 1 of Third Year
Wrote multiple production features in SAP Analytics Cloud
Rotation 2 will take place in the Global Headquarters in Walldorf, Germany

items.title: Sysadmin
description: Elected April 2024
Formerly Chairperson in 2023/24, and First Year Rep in 2022/23
Restored technical aspect of society which went offline in 2020
Worked with IT Department to secure internet access to the Server Room and follow best practices
Current Chief Architect and Lead Developer for multiple projects

items.title: President
description: Elected April 2024
Formerly Grangegorman Chairperson in 2023/24
Duties include chairing Societies Forum, representing Societies to the University, managing budgeting, and overseeing the Societies Executive
Actively interact with over 100 societies and multiple University departments
Focusing on improving Student Life in Tallaght and Blanchardstown campuses, and strengthening all City Campus Societies

items.title: National Champion
description: 25th - 27th of September in the RDS, Dublin
Sponsored by AWS
Three days of differing challenges from system architecture to cybersecurity
Placed first and will represent Ireland in EuroSkills 2025
Received Silver Medal from Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science
Received Award from WorldSkills and Amazon Web Services

items.title: University Champion
description: December 2022 in TU Dublin Blanchardstown
Team of 4 placed first out of 8 other teams
Challenges involved reverse engineering, web exploits, cryptography, and more
Won tickets to IRISSCON CTF 2022 and placed second against industry professionals

items.title: Team Member
description: October 2023 in Hamar, Norway
3-day competition with jeopardy-style and attack-defense challenges
Senior reserve for Team Ireland

items.title: Second Place Winner
description: August 2023 in Maldron Blue Hotel, Dublin
Team of 4 placed second out of 10 other teams
Challenges involved hacking baggage handling systems, air traffic control systems, drones, engine controllers, etc.
Won a cash prize

items.title: Competitor
description: November 2022 in TU Dublin Grangegorman
Team of 4 placed fourth out of 11 other teams
Designed a product which would minimise food waste in Ireland
Designed an app which would connect to supermarket apps and suggest recipes based on what was in the user's fridge
